thread.title: Stay Informed with Real-Time Weather Updates from Telemundo Houston
thread.title_full: Stay Informed with Real-Time Weather Updates from Telemundo Houston

author: archyde
title: Stay Informed with Real-Time Weather Updates from Telemundo Houston
text:
2024-01-16 18:33:50
HOUSTON â€“ The main risk after the passage of an Arctic front over our region seems to have been overcome: the possibility of frozen roads.
However, the intense cold will not leave our region until this Wednesday around noon when the mercury in the thermometer exceeds the 40 degree barrier.
This Tuesday, again, a very cold day is expected with maximum temperatures almost at the freezing point (34 degrees) and with a rapid drop at night and early morning to 20 degrees.
However, the thermal sensations will be about 10 degrees lower due to the winds that are felt from the north (20 to 25 mph) and which will remain until around 6 pm this Tuesday.
Early Wednesday morning the intensity of the winds will reduce, but they are still expected to range between 10 and 20 mph.
If you want to know the weather conditions in real time, Click here.
Thank you for choosing TELEMUNDO HOUSTON.
Do not use grills or leave stoves on,
